about.title: About Allen Spring
about.description: I am an engineering student who is interested in social issues. I like programming and creating some interesting things. I think programming is an art that can express one's thoughts and emotions. I hope to be able to express myself through My skills can bring positive impact to society.

home.title: Hi, I am Allen Spring

home.making: (should be) a relatively accurate combination of voters for the 2024 Taiwan presidential election

home.title: (Probably) more accurate opinion pollls aggregation of 2024 Taiwan election
home.subtitle: To combat political manipulation in election polls, we're dedicated to presenting a more objective and credible view of voter intentions. We achieve this by skillfully blending poll data from various sources, ensuring an accurate and honest representation of public opinion.
